tv_dialog: On the tv, someone is giving a speech
Player: 'Wait, why does that grating, annoying voice sound so familiar?'
As you look at the screen, the cold flame of a long-held grudge is reignited within you.
Commissioner: 'My first act as commissioner? Parking tickets for everyone! YOU get a ticket, and YOU get a ticket! EVERYONE gets a ticket!

Commissioner: 'Now, your parking tickets will fund our police force, but that's not all. Crime rates will drop! Because starting today, we're reclassifying all crimes and giving you fines for EVERYTHING!
Commissioner: 'And some of you may call me corrupt, but you're wrong. I prefer to call it being entrepeneurial. HAHAHAHAHA!'
News Reporter: 'In other news, may god have mercy on our city. More at 11-'

Player: 'That commissioner... That's the ******* monster who gave me a parking ticket and caused me so much financial pain! How can a maniac like him be rewarded with a promotion, let alone get so much control of the city?'
Your simmering anger turns into a BOILING RAGE.
Player: 'That's it! You know what? I'm getting my **** ticket waived and I know just the way to convince him.'
letters_dialog: It's a stack of letters from the city. The newest waste of paper arrived early this morning stating the following:
We're delighted to inform you that you have an overwhelming amount of outstanding late fees for an unpaid parking ticket.
The final deadline for your full payment is by midnight tonight.
Failure to pay will result in public humiliation, additional fees, the immediate closure of your home, a visit from our most 'persuasive' law enforcement officers, and so much more!
Thank you for your forced cooperation.
toilet_dialog: Player: 'I should really clean this after the incident last night...'	*shudders*
shower_dialog: Player: 'I took a shower this morning. I don't need to take another right now.'
couch_dialog: Player: 'It looks super comfy, but I don't want to sit down right now.'
fridge_dialog: You stare blankly towards your empty fridge. You haven't stocked it in 2 weeks... You should really stop ordering takeout.
garbage_dialog: Your garbage can reeks of crumpled takeout boxes and moldy leftovers.
bed_dialog: Your sheets lay haphazardly on the bed like a tornado stopped by. Rough night.
door_locked: Player: 'I don't want to leave right now.'
door_unlocked: Player: 'I should leave. I have a commissioner to defeat and a ticket to waive.'
